name: Elven Last Stand
description:
You are the last hope for saving Elvenland! After a long war of attrition and both sides decimated to their last units. A last, desperate, assault from the orcs makes its way to your homeland... and it's up to you to repell it with the your last, exhausted forces. 

In this Tower Defense type of game you need to place your defenders carefully in order to reject the waves of attacking orcs. The game is 3 levels long and there are 3 levels of difficulty. Music and SFX volume can be changed at any time in the pause menu. 

Resolution requirement is 1920x1080. If it doesn't fit your screen you can also play it at https://sharemygame.com/@OuterGazer/elven-last-stand.

Have fun!
